templates.name: Welcome Email
templates.subject: Welcome to DAWG AI, {{name}}!
templates.html:
Welcome to DAWG AI! 🎵

Hi {{name}},

Thanks for signing up! You're now part of the DAWG AI community.

We're excited to help you create amazing music right in your browser. Here's what you can do:

  • Create, edit, and export professional music tracks
  • Use powerful MIDI editing tools
  • Collaborate with other musicians
  • Access your projects from anywhere
Go to Dashboard

If you have any questions, just reply to this email - we're here to help!

DAWG AI - Browser-based music production
dawgai.com

templates.name: Onboarding - Day 3
templates.subject: Tips for getting the most out of DAWG AI
templates.html:
Hey {{name}}, let's level up your music! 🎶

You've been using DAWG AI for a few days now. Here are some tips to help you get the most out of it:

🎹 Pro Tip 1: Use MIDI Shortcuts

Speed up your workflow with keyboard shortcuts. Press '?' in the editor to see all available shortcuts.

🎼 Pro Tip 2: Save Your Work Often

Enable auto-save in settings to never lose your progress. We automatically save every 2 minutes.

🎵 Pro Tip 3: Export Options

You can export to WAV, MP3, MIDI, or even MusicXML format for maximum compatibility.

Watch Video Tutorials

Keep creating amazing music!

DAWG AI
Unsubscribe from tips
templates.text:
Hey {{name}}, let's level up your music!

You've been using DAWG AI for a few days now. Here are some tips:

1. Use MIDI Shortcuts
   Speed up your workflow with keyboard shortcuts. Press '?' in the editor.

2. Save Your Work Often
   Enable auto-save in settings to never lose your progress.

3. Export Options
   Export to WAV, MP3, MIDI, or MusicXML format.

Watch Video Tutorials: {{tutorialUrl}}

Keep creating amazing music!

DAWG AI

templates.name: Sales Lead Outreach
templates.subject: {{name}}, transform your music production workflow
templates.html:
Hi {{name}},

I noticed you're interested in {{interest}}. I wanted to reach out personally.

At DAWG AI, we're helping {{companySize}} teams like yours streamline their music production workflow with our browser-based DAW.

What makes us different:

  • No software installation required
  • Real-time collaboration
  • Professional MIDI editing tools
  • Cloud storage and syncing

{{personalizedNote}}

Schedule a Demo

Would love to show you how DAWG AI can work for your team.

Best,
{{senderName}}
{{senderTitle}}

DAWG AI
Unsubscribe
